definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Her mind seemed to be wandering, and she didn't recognize me.
sentences.chinese: 她好象精神恍惚，没认出我来。

sentences.english: It seemed as if the starlings had been hypnotised because they acted as if they were not being chased.
sentences.chinese: 椋鸟看似精神恍惚，因此它们的举动像没人追赶一样。

sentences.english: It merely is a reflection of his sometimes spaced-out mentality toward life. He likes to be in the clouds, so let him take you there.
sentences.chinese: 那仅仅是他有时精神恍惚的一个正常反映。

sentences.english: She was always mooning over that bloke.
sentences.chinese: 她老是精神恍惚地想念那小子。

sentences.english: Her mind only vaguely grasped what he was saying.
sentences.chinese: 她精神恍惚地听着他的话语。

sentences.english: That period of time, the mood in the days maple Fanluan, trance.
sentences.chinese: 那一段日子，于天枫心情烦乱，精神恍惚。

sentences.english: She was distracted with grief and refused to be solaced.
sentences.chinese: 她悲痛得精神恍惚，怎么安慰也没用。

definition: to be delirious/to be mentally confused
to be preoccupied (idiom)/to be inattentive/to be frightened out of one's mind
variant of 頭昏腦脹|头昏脑胀[tou2 hun1 nao3 zhang4]
to have a lifeless look in one's eyes (idiom)
